summary: NAR 03-25-2003   MR. THE CONSUMER OWNED A 2001 FORD FOCUS BUT INITIATED THE LEMON LAW AND WAS OFFERED A 200 FORD FOCUS. AFTER A WEEK OF DRIVING THE 2002 VEHICLE, THE ENGINE SHUT OFF WHILE DRIVING, WHICH CAUSED THE STEERING WHEEL TO LOCK.  THE INCIDENT THE CONSUMER EXPERIENCED WAS THE SAME SHE EXPERIENCED WITH THE 2001 FOCUS, HOWEVER THE 2001 HAD  TRUNK AND BRAKE PROBLEMS.  CONSEQUENTLY THE CONSUMER CRASHED INTO ANOTHER VEHICLE.
